tool_description: (*Fastest*) Check domain rating and Ahrefs rank information for any domain/URL.
name: Ahrefs DR & Rank Checker
title: Ahrefs DR & Rank Checker

api_list.name: Check DR and Rank
api_list.description: Check ahrefs DR and rank of a domain
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ahrefs-dr-rank-checker.p.rapidapi.com/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ahrefs-dr-rank-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
